Description: Fueling physicians' success with data-driven technology, education, expert guidance, and bespoke financial solutions
Full Description: Andwise Inc., established in May 2022 by Kanav Jain and Varun Verma, is revolutionizing the way healthcare professionals interact with their finances. Andwise merges the worlds of Financial Services, FinTech, LegalTech, Healthcare, Personal Finance, and Software to craft a unique ecosystem tailored for medical professionals. The platform is tailored for physicians at every career stage, from students grappling with loans to seasoned doctors navigating retirement planning. At its core, Andwise is more than a technology company; it's a movement dedicated to empowering doctors with critical financial knowledge and tools. The company's standout offering, the Contract Analyzer, exemplifies its innovative approach by providing physicians with the ability to evaluate job contract terms efficiently. This is just one aspect of a broader suite of resources, including educational content, interactive tools, and personalized support, all designed to demystify finance for healthcare providers. The creation of Andwise was driven by a deep understanding of the unique financial challenges faced by those in the medical field, a sentiment echoed by the founders and reinforced by the platform's comprehensive approach to financial wellness. Underpinning this is a diverse and experienced Medical Advisory Board, ensuring the platform's offerings remain relevant and impactful. As Andwise continues to grow, it holds the promise of fostering a vibrant community where doctors can share insights, learn from one another, and build a secure financial future together. Joining Andwise means stepping into a community committed to transforming the financial well-being of healthcare professionals everywhere.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Education, Financial Services, Health Care, Professional Services, Software

Description: Bolt develops and licenses market-leading Ray Tracing IP for silicon integration.
Full Description: As the demand for cinema quality visual effects increases, existing solutions are no longer able to meet user expectations. Power consumption continues to rise with minimal performance improvements, resulting in increased cost and negative environmental impact. At Bolt, we focus on designing hardware engines that are 10x faster and more efficient than general purpose solutions like GPUs and CPUs. Our first Ray Tracing products, Lightning and Thunder, were released at CES 2023. We have multiple design wins at advanced nodes and will be delivering chips in late 2024 and pre-built systems in early 2025. Our innovative Ray Tracing technology is being integrated inside popular apps from Epic, Unity, Autodesk, and more, so you can continue using your existing flow and reap the benefits of our technology. Our lead investors include Weili Dai and Sehat Sutardja, the founders of Marvell Technology Group, as well as 10+ major strategic investors in the semiconductor space.

Our AIML models will potentially function as Software as a Medical Device (SAMD).

Description: Dataworkz simplifies GenAI application development for businesses
Full Description: Dataworkz empowers businesses to effortlessly develop Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) applications using proprietary data, utilizing either public LLM APIs or privately hosted open source foundation models. Dataworkz’s RAG builder streamlines building GenAI applications to remove the complexity associated with stitching together a turnkey solution. A composable AI stack provides the ability to choose the vector database, embedding model, chunking strategy and LLM model. You have the flexibility use public LLM APIs including AWS Bedrock and OpenAI or host an open-source model in a VPC. For Advanced RAG applications, Dataworkz provides the ability to combine lexical and semantic search with metadata filtering thereby enabling RAG apps to process large volumes of unstructured, semi-structured or structured data.  Dataworkz connects to different sources of business data - SaaS services, relational databases, NoSQL databases, files stored in cloud object stores and provides no-code transformations to make proprietary data in any format ready for LLM applications. When combining data from multiple sources, you can also configure the precedence order for input sources used to build the context for generating LLM response.   The emergence of hallucinations presents a notable obstacle in the widespread adoption of Gen AI within enterprises. Dataworkz  enables GenAI to reference its origins, consequently enhancing traceability. RAG builder provides an API for any developer to embed GenAI applications into their existing workflow with complete flexibility to customize the look and feel.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: VR Inn is a full-body, free-roam VR content marketplace for location based entertainment
Full Description: When people hear “VR” they immediately think a headset, one or two motion trackers, and a player who waves their hands in a funny way.  At VR Inn, we work on changing the stereotype for good.  What we do is typically called “multiplayer full-body free-roam location-based VR entertainment”. After saying that for three times in a row, we realized that we desperately need a word to describe it in the most concise way. So we found it - and we now call our product “Seamless VR”. Simple as that.  What is Seamless VR?  Seamless VR is a gateway for one or several players to fully immerse into virtual reality - as deep as the state-of-the art technology only allows it. You move your body as you would in the real world, see your own body and other players, interact with VR objects, shoot the enemies - and have complete freedom of movement within the physical location. No tethers. No motion sickness. Just the lightweight portable gear - and the regular walls you might want to avoid bumping into. Bottom line: Seamless VR allows you to interact with the virtual world the same way you would interact with the real world.  We operate as a content marketplace for VR content, and our main goal is to make Seamless VR accessible right around the corner, while also ensuring that everyone with a passion for virtual reality gets their experience - as a player, business owner, or content contributor.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US

Description: Early Light Ventures is a Seed-Stage investor providing funding for early stage SaaS companies generally headquartered in the Mid-Atlantic.
Full Description: We are not unicorn hunters and we don't care if your market size is $1 Billion, or $1 Trillion.  However, we are very disciplined seed-stage investors that have been in your shoes as founders, and will move very fast for the right companies. If we invest, we'll add as much value as possible and be there with you every step of the way.  We only invest in B2B software companies and have a special affinity for companies in the mid-atlantic region. Here are the main quantifiable metrics we're looking for: •	Valuations ranging from $3 million to $12 million  •	$400,000 ARR - $3 million ARR (annual run rate) •	Previously raised less than ~$2 million •	Net burn rate less than $100,000 a month •	Growing at least 80% year-over-year •	Gross churn rates under 4% per year and positive net churn •	Aiming for $50 million - $150 million exits

Full Description: About: Showcase your digital business card, create professional and branded estimates and invoices and organize ongoing and pending projects anywhere, anytime, on-the go! USEFUZE is a FREE tool contractors can use so that they can focus on their work, keep everything organized and better manage your time. – Who uses USEFUZE: USEFUZE is perfect for all contractors; from individuals to teams up to 50, or side hustlers doing one or two projects a month. USEFUZE was designed by an owner of a small painting business and is the best app for: - Painters - Landscapers - Handymen - Carpenters - Contractors - Roofers - Plumbers - Pressure Washers - Electricians - Woodworkers - Driveway Pavers - HVAC - Renovators/Remodelers - Builders - Side hustlers - + Hundreds more – What other contractors are saying? - As a mother of two and the office manager in our family’s small business, USEFUZE has saved me the most important thing: time. I am able to get our estimates, invoices and expense tracking done in half the time, giving me more time with my family. - The best feature of USEFUZE for me is the digital business card. In a second I can share my info, before/after photos of my work and customer reviews with potential customers in a professional format, and it has already helped increase my business. - When I’m trying to concentrate on actually doing the work that I love to do, USEFUZE helps me handle all the digital things that aren’t necessarily my skill set. - When I am at someone’s house doing an estimate, I can text or email the estimate directly to them and get a “Yes” before I even leave their house. - When I share my digital business card with customers, they are immediately impressed with all the past customer reviews, pictures of my work and how organized and professional I appear. I’ve never been more confident that they are going to call me for an estimate. - I’ve sent out invoices and estimates in the mail that never reached my customers and lost so much time tracking down old invoices at the end of the year that I don’t even want to know how much money I’ve lost. With USEFUZE, all of my invoices are easy to organize and keep track of without even having to think about it. - I love doing painting work as a side hustle but I hated doing the paperwork and constantly communicating with customers. With USEFUZE I am starting to enjoy my side hustle again and I’m making more money! - I handed out an old business card to someone at the store and it was so crinkled from being in my wallet they couldn’t even read it. I went home and immediately started looking for digital business cards online. Most digital business cards only let you put your contact info but with USEFUZE you can add customer ratings and pictures of work. – You and thousands of contractors work hard to earn your money, to grow your customers, and keep up with life’s demands! Contractors, are you frustrated with sending estimates, missing invoices, tracking customer payments, and remembering where those work showcase photos are? How about highlighting a great review for your work from a satisfied customer? Then USEFUZE is the mobile app for you! Benefits: • All your business needs in one app • Free to download and use • Create estimates and invoices • Track income over time • Share your work on social media • Share digital business card directly to customers • Organize all your ongoing and pending jobs • No ads • Secure data and backup. • All on your phone - One app - free - secure!

FINOS believes that organizations that embrace open source software development and common standards will be best positioned to capture the growth opportunities presented by this transformation.  The foundation offers an Open Developer Platform (ODP), a compliant Open Source Readiness Program and The Open Source Strategy Forum (OSSF), the leading global event for financial executives and technologists dedicated to open innovation.  Foundation OSS Projects are Apache 2.0 licensed and available on GitHub. Join the Community today at http://finos.org and follow us at http://twitter.com/finosfoundation
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Information Technology, Lending and Investments, Software

Full Description: BIKIA HEALTH is an AI-based healthtech empowering Latin America’s doctors with unparalleled efficiency and diagnostics capabilities. Through single retinal image analysis, Bikia’s AI solution assists clinicians in the early detection of systemic and prevalent diseases, while gathering mass medical data of the underserved population.  Bikia leverages non-invasive retinal cameras to offer accessible exams throughout Latin America, with accurate and scalable diagnosis. Currently advancing on market entry plans, Bikia is working hand in hand with medical institutions in Colombia and Mexico, to launch its first clinically-validated exam, focusing on early detection of Diabetic and Hypertensive Retinopathy. Additionally, BIKIA's emphasis on early detection and prevention, especially in remote areas lacking specialists, curtails long-term healthcare expenses by tackling conditions in their early stages with an innovative approach that aligns with the global shift to Value-Based Healthcare (VBH) models, driving transformation in the healthcare sector. By harnessing robust data collection capabilities, we empower healthcare providers with invaluable insights, enabling personalised treatment plans that enhance medical interventions' efficacy.

Description: At MaiVERIC, we enhance the capabilities of public safety agencies to further protect the communities they serve.
Full Description: At MaiVERIC, we enhance the capabilities of public safety agencies to further protect the communities they serve. We do so responsibly, under the law, respecting people’s privacy rights. Our mission is to contribute to the spread of safety and peace in our communities by deploying AI-based systems capable of rapidly analyzing data sets at scale. Our Eye Witness application allows investigators to compare data received from crime scenes with millions of lawfully compiled known offender records. When likely matches are found, agents can use the available profiles to expedite their investigations. When no matches are found, agents have the ability to add the unknown faces to person-of-interest databases, which in turn can be used to track suspects linked to multiple investigations.   The deployment of Eye Witness across several agencies allows for the secure sharing of known offenders and persons of interest, significantly increasing the effectiveness of the system to solve cases.

We are leveraging advanced computing and blockchain technology to break down barriers, creating a virtual universe that offers limitless possibilities for individuals, brands, institutions, and investors alike. We envision an Internet where every user is also an integral part of the xSpectar universe, a place where each 2D website is transformed into an immersive 3D experience. Our vision is ambitious yet simple: to be the pioneering force in the metaverse, to the Internet what Google is to search engines and Facebook to social media. We see xSpectar revolutionizing a wide spectrum of industries and creating altogether new ones. The future of the Internet is 3D, and at xSpectar, we're leading the way. Join us as we shape this exciting new frontier.

Description: Stavatti Aerospace Ltd is an aircraft manufacturer focused on the design and production of military,commercial and general aviation aircraft
Full Description: Stavatti Aerospace Ltd is an aircraft manufacturer focused on the design and production of military, commercial and general aviation aircraft. Stavatti was formed with a vision to change the way aircraft are designed and built in order to improve efficiency, quality, safety and performance while reducing the cost of ownership and operation. Benefiting from designs, methods and approaches that are revolutionary, Stavatti will produce aerospace vehicles that offer greater capabilities, greater efficiencies and significantly greater levels of affordability. Stavatti is about producing families of advanced aircraft ranging from Sportplanes and Military Trainers, to Air Superiority Fighters and Commercial Airliners. Engaging in the research, design, development, flight test, certification, qualification, manufacture, sale, service and logistical support of new and original aircraft and aerospace vehicles, Stavatti aircraft will be produced in piloted, remotely unpiloted and autonomous unpiloted configurations. Creating new aerospace vehicles as either wholly owned programs or as joint venture projects with Strategic Partners, aircraft now under development include the SM-26 Sleek Sportplane, SM-27 Machete Turboprop CAS/Attack, SM-27 Machete Turbofan CAS/Attack, SM-31 Stiletto Supersonic Trainer and Light Fighter, SM-36 Stalma Multi-Role Fighter, SM-39 Razor Next Generation Air Dominance Fighter, SM-45 Aviara 5 Seat Sportplane, SM-47 Super Machete Air Defense Fighter, SM-100 Twin Engine Transport, SM-150 2 Seat Sportplane and the SM-920 Single Aisle Airliner. Stavatti Aerospace Ltd was founded in Eagan, Minnesota in April 2014 and was reorganized as a Wyoming C Corporation in December 2019. The purpose of Stavatti Aerospace is to design and manufacture of next generation aircraft and aerospace vehicles. Including military aerospace vehicles, commercial aerospace vehicles and general aviation aircraft, Stavatti focuses upon the creation of new piloted and unpiloted transportation and defense systems. Concentrating primarily upon new design products created as Stavatti initiatives, Stavatti Aerospace can also enhance and modify non-Stavatti aircraft, as well as produce non-Stavatti designed aircraft as a type certificate holder or a licensee. Stavatti Aerospace also focuses upon the design of launch vehicles, missile systems, ordnance, aerospace vehicle powerplants and can provide aerospace design and production related services. Stavatti Aerospace is organized into seven distinct divisions including Stavatti Military Aerospace (focused on the design and production of military aerospace vehicles), Stavatti General Aviation (focused on the design and production of general aviation sport aircraft for private pilots), Stavatti Commercial Aerospace (focused on the design of commercial airliners and aerospace vehicles for civil transport), Stavatti Missiles and Ordnance (focused on the design and production of aircraft missiles and ordnance as well as launch vehicles), Stavatti Interplanetary (focused on the design and production of interplanetary aerospace vehicles and spacecraft), Stavatti Interstellar (focused on the design and production of interstellar aerospace vehicles and spacecraft and Stavatti Aerospace Systems (focused upon the design and manufacture of aircraft systems including avionics, sensors, actuators, landing gear, electromechanical systems, ejection seats, aircraft armament, etc.).
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: CPP Inc is publisher of the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator® assessment.
Full Description: CPP, Inc., publisher of the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator® assessment. We promise to help guide you through whatever organizational opportunities and challenges you face—from team building, leadership and coaching, and conflict management to career development, selection, and retention. Clients Our clients include businesses of all sizes, among them many Fortune 500 companies, as well as educators, government agencies, and training and development consultants. Over the years, our hundreds of offerings have been used by millions of individuals in more than 100 countries. Heritage Our story began more than 50 years ago with the pairing of two psychology professors—one from Stanford and one from U.C. Berkeley—with a common goal: to use research-based psychological assessments to give people the insight and guidance they need to develop in both their personal and professional lives. Their partnership resulted in the creation of CPP, Inc., the company formerly known as Consulting Psychologists Press. Honoring Dr. Harrison Gough (1921-2014) On May 4th, 2014, we lost one of our founding fathers, Harrison G. Gough, PhD. Dr. Gough leaves behind a remarkable legacy of dedication, kindness, caring, creativity, and, of course, his many extraordinary contributions to the field of psychology—including the California Psychological Inventory™ (CPI™) assessment. All of us at CPP are honored to carry on his work and his vision to “help millions of people, including our employees, develop themselves.” Myers-Briggs® Assessment But our roots reach even deeper than that. The Myers-Briggs® assessment was first developed in 1943 by Katharine Cook Briggs and Isabel Briggs Myers. This mother-and-daughter team were among the most prominent pioneers of personality assessment. In 1975, CPP became the exclusive publisher of the Myers-Briggs instrument. Today, CPP is a world leader in personality, career, and organizational development assessments. We are grateful to our loyal clients for making this possible.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: Enterprise Security Posture Management (ESPM): Assets & Identity, Risk Assurance.
Full Description: Funded by leading venture investors like Hoxton Ventures (investors in Darktrace), and founded by former security experts from companies like Check Point, RSA, Radware, and Akamai, BeyondRisk is pioneering the ESPM space. The platform stands out by addressing the critical industry oversight of on-premises and internal risks, which have been traditionally overshadowed by a myopic focus on cloud security. Our approach is designed to dismantle the data silos that obscure a comprehensive view of enterprise security postures, integrating identity, applications, permissions, and more into a seamless, holistic framework. BeyondRisk's agentless, API-centric connectivity simplifies the once complex task of tech stack integration, ushering in an era where continuous, real-time posture management is the norm. BeyondRisk is not just about automation; it's about integration, context, and continuous oversight, marking a transformative step in how enterprises approach their security landscape. Complementing this is our industry-first 'pay-as-you-grow' pricing, which reflects our commitment to grow alongside our clients, offering a transparent, value-based pricing model tailored to each stage of their growth.

Industries: Apps, Delivery Service, Information Technology, Software
Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: Uber + Shipping = Deliverable
Full Description: Company Overview: The Deliverable team has been working tirelessly to produce a mobile application for my app. Between the drivers and the mobile application engineers, we have developed a whole new niche market of “same day” delivery. In the aftermath of a pandemic, my team is dedicated to providing our consumers with the best delivery options feasible. For the first time in history, we are inventing a revolutionary idea, which promotes same-day shipping. A consumer does not have to wait for two-to-three-days for delivery anymore. With Deliverable, the item will be driven to the consumer’s door within a 60 - 90 minute window.   Pain: Given our current circumstances, in our post-COVID-19 society, no one could have imagined that consumers are not going out to the brick and mortar stores any longer. According to a recent poll, more than seventy percent of consumers are conducting their shopping online, even for personal items. Due to society’s introversion, this planted the seed for the innovative application, Deliverable, in which one does not have to leave their home to obtain everyday items, such as groceries, household items, games, furniture, antiques, and miscellaneous item. Big box companies are already speaking with Deliverable to innovate the way we ship.    Solution: Instead of the onerous task of brick and mortar shopping, Deliverable provides a mobile application for consumers to receive items in the same business day or within ninety minutes, without ever having to leave their doorstep. With the click of a few buttons. Like any delivery service, the driver does not have to make contact with the person who receives the item, which limits the interaction to the Covid-19. The delivery driver acts like a post-man, and the item will be left at one’s doorstep without ever coming face-to-face. The entire transaction is completed through cyberspace. Technology: Currently, on Deliverable financial budget, Deliverable has produced an Apple (iPad and iPhone) version of the mobile application, and our next goal is to launch the Android version, but we need more funding in order to continue to make the application accessible for all consumers. In order to promote the application, we need marketing dollars. We would like to make Deliverable a household name. With marketing dollars, we can fund the press releases, commercials, radio broadcasts, referral, SEO, SMM, etc. IP/Defensibility: My intellectual property has a patent, and I have a lawyer on the payroll. My IP is protected by our patent, and Deliverable has a patent-lawyer on speed-dial, Hugh Keefe, Esq.   Competition/Competitive Advantage:  Target, Walmart, and Offerup, each company has already stolen parts of my intellectual patent for their business’s shipping options, and they are offering “same day shipping” on their mobile application. After speaking with my lawyer, Attorney Keefe, each company must cease and desist their “same day shipping” options. If these big-box giants, partner with Deliverable, we will be driving Walmart and Target products to customer’s doorstep. Additionally, on the app, we will stimulate the pricing of products in retail, because there is a follow social feature. When someone delivers something, the price and any info gets posted on a list. When the consumer sees that price they will possibly change their buying methods. Market Size/Customers: The goal for our market size in the United States—we launch the application nationwide. Per state, Deliverable is looking, to begin with, Connecticut and New York. Subsequently, we have five drivers and are currently in a race to get 200, independent contractors, ready on stand-by, in Connecticut as soon as the app launches on Friday. Once the analytic data from Connecticut and New York goes through our Firebase cloud, with your funding we will launch nationwide. Deliverable offers customers a free-delivery, one-time free coupon, upon their registration of the mobile application.  Free delivery is one way for the application to go viral (Uber did the same tactic.) The postal market is very lucrative. If we get one percent of the national postal market, according to pre-COVID-19 numbers in 2018, USPS, FedEx, and UPS deliver over 56 million packages per day which leads to 5,400,000 packages being handled through Deliverable per day. If each delivery transaction is 20$, the daily numbers would be in the millions $108,000,000.  Business Model: The Deliverable business model is very simple: provide an excellent same-day delivery service to everyday consumers, and our goal is to transport as many items as we can per day to the appropriate destination. Also, we need to partner with as many companies as we can, so they can include us as an option at their mobile checkout. Once we are funded, we can open analytic data-centers (one in every two states) to analyze the information to make sure we do not have any downtime. Driver to Consumer collaboration will be made with the separate application that is currently underway. Milestones: As a team, we are launching a mobile application this week. Our first milestone is we found an innovative team of engineers in India, to maintain our budget, who is currently working on finalizing the mobile application.  We fulfilled our quota for drivers in New York and Connecticut. Financial: Deliverable gets paid on a daily basis, and projections are high. As soon as the application launches, I will make sure each driver is compensated for each completed delivery. The driver gets 60% and the company gets 40%. For example, if the delivery is 20$. The driver gets 12$ and we get $8. As soon as the driver completes the delivery, the driver gets paid immediately through the mobile application. Per each state, there will be charging sales tax. There is a standard insurance clause the consumer agrees to when they register for the application. This is how our financial work = $2.99 a mile for a small to mid-size vehicle. $3.49 a mile for a larger car or SUV. Finally, it’s $3.99 to $4.49 depending on whether a truck, flatbed, or freight has to be used.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: BlueConduit uses machine learning to support the removal of lead and other dangerous materials from communities.
Full Description: BlueConduit uses machine learning to support the removal of lead and other dangerous materials from communities.  In 2016, a team of researchers from the University of Michigan began working with Flint’s service line replacement program. By that time, it was understood that the city’s lead service lines were the main source of lead in the drinking water but two key questions stood in the way of their progress: how many lead pipes are in the city and which homes have lead pipes? The researchers applied fundamental statistical methods to this problem and built a machine learning model to help the city dig where the lead actually was. In 2019, the University of Michigan researchers who worked in Flint formed BlueConduit with the mission of supporting the large-scale removal of lead and other dangerous pipe materials from cities.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: The Property Advocates, P.A. is a full-service Florida insurance law firm specializing in property insurance claims.
Full Description: The Property Advocates, P.A. is a Florida-based insurance law firm that offers a range of personalized legal services, specializing in property insurance claims. They currently have offices in Tampa, Orlando, and Miami, and almost 25 knowledgeable attorneys who are ready to go to bat for their clients. The team is well-versed in all steps of handling insurance claims, from filing a claim to appealing a denied claim or filing a lawsuit if needed, as many of their team members have worked for insurance companies and engaged in aggressive trial litigation. The Property Advocates is dedicated to helping clients in their times of need. While they can't prevent natural disasters and property damage, these seasoned professionals will step in with the expertise, resources, and drive to ensure their clients get proper and fair treatment from their insurance company. The firm specializes in denied first-party property insurance claims pertaining to fire, water, storm, and hurricane damage, as well as plumbing, roof leaks, theft/ vandalism, and more. The compassionate professionals at The Property Advocates have abundant experience inside and outside the courtroom. They help clients understand their rights, strategies insurance companies may use during the claims process, and guide clients through every step of the legal process to ensure they get the most out of their insurance coverage. The Property Advocates has the resources of a large law firm yet feels like a small family firm and prides itself on providing personalized representation to all clients to best suit everyone's individual needs and budget. With customer experience, first and foremost, they always provide the highest level of care. By helping thousands of Florida residents navigate the complexities of insurance claims, The Property Advocates have positively impacted local communities and helped foster Florida's housing industry.
Headquarters Regions: Tampa Bay Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: SocialCap - helps users effectively manage their contacts, connections and time.
Full Description: SocialCap is an innovative startup that pioneers a smart ecosystem, transforming the landscape of personal contact management and social networking. At its core, SocialCap amalgamates advanced technologies with insights derived from social, behavioral, psychological, and anthropological sciences to enhance the quality of connections and social networking experiences. At the heart of SocialCap is a sophisticated platform leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance contact management and create meaningful connections. Business Description: SocialCap addresses the rising demand for efficient personal contact management by combining cutting-edge technology with scientific principles. It stands as an indispensable tool for professionals, entrepreneurs, and individuals aiming to optimize their social interactions and achieve personal and professional goals through a science-driven approach. Key Features: Contact Dashboards: SocialCap introduces dynamic and user-friendly contact dashboards, driven by insights from social sciences. This provides users with a holistic view of their network, incorporating elements from behavioral and psychological sciences to enhance interaction and relationship dynamics. AI-Powered Management: SocialCap employs artificial intelligence harmoniously with principles from anthropology and psychology to automate contact organization. It intelligently gathers and updates contact information, ensuring users stay connected and informed while aligning with human behavior patterns. Efficient Networking Tools: SocialCap is not just a contact management tool; it's a business companion for advanced social networking communication. Users can seamlessly navigate their network, identify key connections, and unlock opportunities for achive their goals. Technologies Used: Artificial Intelligence (AI): SocialCap harnesses the power of AI for automating contact management, enriching contact data, and providing intelligent insights for more effective networking. Cloud Technology: The platform utilizes cloud infrastructure for scalable and secure data storage, ensuring accessibility and data integrity for users across various devices. Data Analytics: SocialCap incorporates data analytics to offer users insights into their networking progress, helping them make informed decisions about their social interactions and connections. Mission and Vision: SocialCap's mission is to empower individuals to take control of their personal and professional networks, fostering meaningful connections and enhancing productivity. Our vision is to be the go-to platform for anyone looking to optimize their social capital for personal and professional success. By supporting SocialCap, you are investing in a groundbreaking solution that not only streamlines contact management but also propels social communication into the future.
Headquarters Regions: Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex, Southern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Education, Information Technology, Other, Professional Services, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: The Future of Work is Diversity. Motivated Vetted Tech Talent. 5h Free Trial. Transparent Budget Control. Productivity and Responsiveness.
Full Description: LD Talent is a future-of-work platform that has helped 100+ remote teams quickly find and manage vetted, motivated, and productive developers, AI / ML experts, designers, and more. It’s hard to find skilled, reliable, and agile talent. Teams spend time evaluating talent and building trust, only to lose them to attrition. There is a chicken and egg problem where everyone wants the best, but few focus on how experts come to be. Teams also fail to see the entrepreneurial potential in talent. - In our unique ecosystem, we not only vet but also produce experts by investing in talent’s lifelong learning. - We help teams discover overlooked but underrepresented go-getters from Africa and Asia, who are less subject to attrition. - Clients can hire for contract and full-time roles. - To ensure quality, we invented a “chat-based work sessions” system which enables work transparency and budget control. The system also collects granular data on talent’s responsiveness and on-the-job performance. - The majority world can produce more than just outsourced coders, so we invest in our talent’s own ideas too. Mission: Strengthen remote teams by helping them drop location constraints and include qualified but overlooked talent from the majority world: diversity meets capitalism. Vision: Build a future of work around diversity and social impact, by incentivizing lifelong learning and democratizing expert engineering, design, and entrepreneurship.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Education, Other, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
